reviews.review: Burning houses with lemons since 2011.

I like the insults.
Also i like shooting portals.
This game is a fun and challenging single and or co-op adventure through the aperture science lab. 100% recommend it!

Let me start out by saying that I have been a hardcore gamer since the good old Atari 2600.  That being said, Portal 2 is easily in the top 5 games I have ever played. Graphics are good, the story is as creative as they come, and the gameplay is refined and solid. But it's the humor they worked into the game that makes it worth playing over and over again. If you don't have this game GET IT. You don't need to play the original Portal to enjoy it. But I would reccomend it just for plot information. (Btw Portal 1 is in my top 20 as well). This one really is a no brainer so just buy it allready! Save your brain cells for figuring out the puzzles!    10/10.

here is why not to buy this game if you have serious anger issues you will brake your computer trying to figure out how to play it other than that
10-10

I loved this game. I personally preferred it on the console only because I feel I had better control with a controller instead of a keyboard and mouse.

This is a really satisfying sequel if you loved Portal and were craving more. The story and dialog only make it worth at least one play through.

Cave Johnson: "Portal 2, the familiar and still well-played sequel to Portal. This is a great game for the holidays, and honestly, just any time of the year, assuming it's on sale, or even if it isn't. I mean, it's $20, so we should be paying you, as $20 is way, way, way too much. Here at Aperture, we thrive to make it a gruesome and rough experience for our test subjects, who paid to do this, for no reason, I mean, we should be paying them. Now, this is simple. You obtain a portal gun, and blast portals everywhere. Simple as that."

 Cave is right. This has mind-bending puzzles. It even has a level editor, co-op, and, as fate would have it, a co-op level editor.

*SPOILER ALERT*

 Protaganists:

Chell
Atlas + P-Body (Co-op robots)
GLaDOS
Cave Johnson (NPC)
Caroline (NPC)

 Antaganists:

GLaDOS (some parts)
Wheatley

This game has everything. Puzzles, action, and some new mechanics. Portal 2 has gels, long-fall boots (no real difference), etc. 

 Cave Johnson: "The cycle of life continues. You buy this game, you play this game, you buy more games on Steam, as it was also made by Valve, and Valve is happy. Caroline, would you show them more support of what I just said?

 Caroline: "Yes, sir!"

 Caroline: "Thanks to the new Cooperative and Perpetual Testing Initiatives, you can play with your friends and make levels for each other! Even make levels to play together! We hope to see you at Aperture!"

 Not a lot is worthy at Aperture. However, a cube inside a spherical button designed for edgeless safety cubes, is not good enough. A cube on a cubical button is better. Running on gel, falling into a pit, gaining momentum to launch yourself to the door is Aperture Science.

 Announcer: "We hope you have enjoyed this pre-recorded message. Cave Johnson is deceased and Caroline is semi-deceased now, as Cave Johnson has passed in 2005, and Caroline is inside GLaDOS."

 We're done here. It's up to you. Which path will you choose:

A. Buy this game and make Valve happy.

B. Buy this game and make Valve happy!

C. Buy this game and make Valve happy?

10/10 "Quantum Space Hole" Amazing

Richtig guter Singleplayer verknüpft mit perfektem Co-op Spielgefühl. Zu zweit macht dieses Spiel unglaublich viel Spaß. Ich kann dieses Spiel nur jedem empfehlen, der Strategiespiele mag und sich für das Nachdenken genug Zeit nehmen will.

According to Steam I've only played this game for a bout 28 hours. But in that time it made a greater impression on me than just about any other game I've ever played. There is a reason this game is a legend. 

I think about the story all the time, the gameplay is fantastic and smooth even when it's bending your brain, the dialog is witty without being trite, the game design is pitch perfect...and then you finish the game and can play multiplayer with a friend. But where the single player campaign has brilliant writing and voice acting and story, the multiplayer campaign...well, it has all those things too. Just a tad less of them. It's still freaking amazing. 

And then you have all the user-created content...

If you don't have this game you need it.

While i was playing this game, i broke up with my girlfriend. After it my brain exploded of that load of knowledge and intelligence gained while playing.

Portal é um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, com um enredo espetacular. No primeiro jogo, conhecemos a impiedosa GLaDOS, e seu humor áspero. Neste segundo, somos convidados a explorar a historia por traz de GLaDOS, as entranhas da Aperture Science e seu criador. Muito mais do que um jogo de Pluzzes, Portal 2 é um jogo filosófico, bem humorado, com uma temática unica. Super recomendado!
great

This game is a great puzzle game, and I have to admit, I'm an idiot when it comes to puzzles. But if you get through, it's a great game. I think that this game is one of the best games I've ever played honestly. Great story, voice acting, and all. 10/10 game, will play again in the future.

I never thought I would enjoy a game like this. WTF is this game???? I LOVE IT!!!
I love the way this game puts your mind to work, brilliant. 
Probably if it weren't at daily deal, i wouldn't have bought it. But i am happy i did.
A small con: enemies aren't such of a  threat (at least so far, i am arround chapter5 i think). I mean, even if they hit you, they don't kill you. And if u die, by jumping into the toxic water, u get respawned right away, nearby. The game doesn't seem really punishing. But as i said, at least where i am now.
Anyway, nice experience. One of my best 3euros spent on games.

Если вы когда-нибудь спрашивали себя: "Купить ли эту игру?".  Я вам отвечу: "Конечно". Эта игра затянет вас и вам обязательно захочется её перепройти. 
Итак, плюсы этой игры:
1) Неплохая графика
2) Прекрасный сюжет
3) Хорошая озвучка
4) Юмор
5) Завораживающая концовка
6) Вы можете делать в этой игре испытания сами
Итак, минусы этой игры:
1) Их просто не существует
 Советую вам приобрести эту игру, если её у вас нету, потому что игра стоит своих денег и купив её вы получите несколько прекрасных часов качественного и проработанного геймплея.
Жаль нельзя стереть себе память и пройти эту игру снова(
Wait, I have to, wait, what?

This is the gold standard for me, any game I buy eventually gets compared with Portal 2. I've given up hope of a third Portal, but I still find this one AMAZING. If you haven't played it, you need to. And remember, the cake will always be a lie.

В игре Portal 2 Можно познать законы физики и предательство друга. В отличии от первой части игры, здесь присутствует сюжет. Не говоря уже про Co-oP сюжет, который также затягивает и имеет две концовки. А когда добавили поддержку Steam Workshop, появилась способность создавать и опубликовувать свои тестовые камеры. С тех пор уже столько созданых камер, что их все можно проходить вечно. Почему вечно? Потому что пока одни камеры пройдёте, новых уже насоздают. Всем кто ещо не играл в Portal 2, я настоятельно рекомендую поиграть и пройти.
мне очень понравилась игра, надеюсь вы выпустите 3-ю часть) P.S. Еще надеюсь что вы начнете разработку Half-Life 3 =3
Игра интересна если играть в кооперативе можно поугарать ) мне понравилось

В моем обзоре вы не найдете никакого анализа игры, лишь мое мнение. Глядя на статистику в 99% положительных обзоров , я не смог удержаться и тоже написать что-нибудь хорошее про Portal 2. Я считаю ее одной из самых лучших игр от Valve да и вообще лучшей игрой в мире. Тут есть абсолютно все. Игра для всех и навсегда. Вот что для меня Portal 2. Отмечу то, что она обладает превосходным сюжетом. Кроме этого, в нее фактически можно играть вечно - камер испытаний, сделанных Сообществом, Вам хватит на всю вашу жизнь. А если надоест играть в чужие - создай свои. МАСТ ХЭВ 11/10

Одна из немногих игр, где не нужно никого убивать. В "Portal 2" царит прекрасная атмосфера. При всей незамысловатости геймплея, игра заставляет вас шевелить извилинами. Интересный сюжет и прикольное совместное прохождение. Едкие подколы от Глэдис тоже доставляют.)

This is one of the best puzzle co-op games I have played for a very long time. I wish other games would learn something from this and implant the puzzle part in lets say MMORPG's. It's awesome that you actually have to think instead of just destroy all around you.
10/10 best game

This is the single most phenomenal smart first person game available on Steam (or elsewhere) as of December 2014.

Yes, Talos Principle is comparable (arguably smarter), but... different. Not as complete as a package. And much more expensive. Antichamber, Q.U.B.E., Mind, Stanley Parable, etc. are all good, but at least a step below these two. So just stop reading these reviews, they will all (mostly) say the same thing. If you won't like this game, you might as well uninstall Steam and go fishing or, I don't know, to the movies, coz gaming is quite probably not for you.
